case.state: Futaba is here as well? Did you also win a prize from "High Quality Breadcrusts?"
Is this "The Inventory?" I won a sweepstakes promising me a "night of artistic inspiration."
Futaba is here as well? Did you also win a prize from "High Quality Breadcrusts?"
Today is the anniversary of when Futaba was brought into this world! Happy Birthday, Futaba!
I do believe today is Haru's birthday! Let it be a celebration worth remembering!
Regardless of how you got here, the reason why you are here is resolute. Let's begin!
So the objective of this game is to remove clothing? Ah! A perfect opportunity to witness some nude modeling!
I require ~cards~ cards.
Will ~cards~ cards do?
I suppose I should take ~cards~ cards.
Yes, I will take ~cards~ cards!
Hm? Oh, yes. ~cards~ cards please.
~cards~ cards, with haste dealer!
My strategy? ~cards~ cards!
How humorous, my cards appear to be in linear order...
Is this...the work of god?!
My hand is but a single color... a moment of tranquility within this perverse chaos.
And the curtain.. falls!
Let’s see where the whims of fate lead us!
I must say, there is a certain thrill to this!
All according to plan.
Magnificent.
Behold, my magnum opus!
The cornered fox strikes!
Is it a good thing when the numbers match?
These cards are nice, but I find the people here much more interesting to stare at.
I see... is that really all there is to this game?
Did I win?
I must be a natural.
It would seem that I have attained mastery over this game's rules.
Is everyone else happy with their hand?
I sense a spontaneous synergy within my cards!
People always tell me I have a poker face. Does that give me an advantage?
This hand speaks to me!
These duplicate cards certainly take me back.
A display truly worthy of being framed!
It is decided! I will win this hand!
I believe this is what Futaba calls a "Pro Gamer Moment."
This hand is lovely. Thank you dealer.
Witness my poker skills!
Which one of you is up next?
Truly a sight to behold!
Sorry! I will be keeping my clothing this round!
I am fairly certain this is a good hand!
Now to simply sit back and observe.
Mere minutes ago I would have found the contents of this hand to be quite dull, yet now they have me shaking with anticipation.
I have never felt such uncertainty…
Hm….
I must keep my guard up.
Now is not the time for vague interpretation!
These cards bore me, does anyone else have anything more interesting?
Is it okay if I get someone else’s opinion regarding these cards?
These cards fail to elicit any kind of emotional response.
I don't understand...
While I fail to understand these cards, I am still quite confident in my abilities as an artist.
This hand isn’t making much of a statement.
This hand is but a blank canvas...
I suppose anything could happen from here.
There must be something more to these cards.
Perhaps the next round will bear more interesting cards.
Were every moment of life exciting, excitement would lose all meaning!
I suppose this works.
Why must we only fish for pairs? Does that not limit creative plays?
A little monotony never hurt anyone.
I was anticipating something more... remarkable.
I admit, there is something very peaceful about all this.
We will see how average you find these cards are once you have fallen to them!
It matters not if my hand is perfect! Even the slightest edge can secure victory!
How mediocre...
Well, it seems I am up next.
There does not appear to be a consistent theme with this hand…
I’m not mad… after all the cards have done nothing wrong.
To the untrained eye these cards are terrible... I for one see their true potential!
Dealer! You could have simply asked for me to strip next!
I have been bamboozled...
On the canvas, one must own their mistakes.
Mistakes are simply part of the creative process.
What went wrong?
Preposterous!
These cards leave much to be desired...
I should have known...
"This hand is amazing!" How was that? Did it sound sincere?
To think that there are people who wager money playing this game...
But I wanted a good hand...?
I’m starting to feel a little motion sick...
But I wanted a good hand...?
I feel faint…
My hand has betrayed me!
This rumbling in my stomach! It surely signifies the dread I feel within!
If I may ask, is it against the rules to duplicate my own cards?
Utterly ridiculous!
What would Joker do with these cards?
This must be how Goemon felt before he was sent to the cauldron...
You can't be serious!
Dealer? May I have a new hand? This one feels somewhat lacking…
This feeling is akin to artist's block.
What should I do?
This simply won't do.
This is much more difficult than I anticipated.
I can't say that I am pleased with this result.
I must strive for better!
Surely there must be something I can do with this hand.
Pass... Is that not an option in this game?
I don’t see any matching numbers.
My! What a fine variety of cards I have!
Ah, I see! This must mean I lose the round!
May I volunteer to strip? I still don't quite understand what's going on.
Not the hand you've been dealt in poker though! I was so distracted, I had hardly realized how much you were losing!
I do have a seminar tomorrow. Afterwards I intend to visit the railway station and observe those that pass by. There's a bag of karamucho I've been saving for the occasion.
I put great value in the consistency of one's voice; how often I can rely on them to be honest with me. Such individuals truly make a difference.
My classmates often "joke" about the simple nature of the masses. The moment you underestimate your audience is the moment you invalidate your work!
Were it not for the cunning exploits of Ishikawa Goemon, I would not be the man I am today. His influence gave me the courage to take a stand when I needed to most!
I'd much rather start an influential movement than be known as the man from which it originated. The pursuit of fame has corrupted many artists.
Photography can only capture but a single moment. Not to discredit the medium; I simply wish to capture the entirety of the human condition!
Speak to his passion! If I were to meet anyone that knows the difference between impressionism and post impressionism, my heart would melt!
How would a bread company know my past as a Phantom Thief? Or my interests in the arts? This is actually very concerning!
"The" is quite strange when repeated over and over. And yet, for how often we use it, no one even questions it.
If it makes you feel better, Streaming-chan, I'm still watching with great anticipation!
I'm honestly surprised that they don't have any live performances here. What, with all the talented individuals around.
Almost makes me shed a tear, truly a touching story.
Should the cabbage prove difficult to catch, perhaps you could use your cape, ~name~? It possesses net-like properties, does it not?
I did once aid in the destruction a giant metal abomination derived from the warped desires of the collective unconscious... Does that count?
You certainly stand out to me.
I personally wouldn't mind the works of Shinichi Suzuki. His strings always help me find my flow!
Some cretin once swapped the cyan paint with a hideous turquoise. It completely ruined my color composition.
(<i>Does exercise within cognition not yield any benefits?<i>)
The sweepstakes specified that "I should come wearing my old school uniform." It's quite strange that they would ask you to do the same...
I shall take the coy approach and not give away the nature of my hand.
I could have spent this time at the aquarium...
So this is my fate…
Times like these one must stay calm.
On one hand, I desire to see everyone disrobe, but the caveat of the forfeit is something I simply cannot look forward to.
To think I am spending my leisure time here...
I still have every intention of immortalizing your naked bodies within my canvas, do not be mistaken!
I find myself feeling rather peckish. Is it possible to obtain food from this establishment?
Where do I go from here?
This establishment is far too loud, couldn't we play somewhere with a more serene atmosphere? Say, Leblanc?
Does anyone wish to go shopping after this? I hear Triple Seven is having a sale.
Mochi?...No, perhaps some yokan… I simply cannot decide!
If only I brought my art supplies...
It just occurred to me that I lack sufficient funds to take the train home.
My next motif should be...
For the forfeit, what if the losers has to strike poses of the winner's choice? Far more tasteful!
When you boil a lobster, it's not actually screaming. It is simply the sound of the air escaping it's body. Still gruesome if you ask me...
"Theoretically, Lobsters can live forever due to a special enzyme.George the lobster was released from captivity at the age of 140." I long to meet him some day.
"Lobsters perceive their surroundings by tasting things with their feet." I can scarce imagine such an existence!
When in danger, lobsters are known to amputate their own limbs for a nimble escape! Fear not! The lobster feels no pain, and grows it's limbs back at a later date!
In an attempt to put value into lobster shells, the lobster industry processed excess shells into golf balls. Alas, these balls are not tournament legal.
Lobsters were once deemed peasant food, until duplicitous merchants sold them to foreigners as an "exotic good." Those industrious deviants ruined it for everyone!
It certainly delivered on the lewd aspect, but it was evident that you were trying to impress us. Next time I'd like to see you masturbate for yourself.

condition.saying: They say artists starve, but they always seemed to have rich parents to me.

case.state: I am ashamed to admit that my adoptive Father played that role. We lived in a shack, yet he would be absent for days, secretly living a life of vice and luxury.

condition.saying: That's how I ended up with a job painting the walls red

case.state: I'm sorry to hear that, Revy; does it pay decently, at least? I hear interior decoration is laborious work.
Don't worry about it, Tomoko-chan. This is part of the process of understanding one other. In what way am I "weird"?
I'm certainly charmed by your invitation Jura. Unfortunately I don't think you're properly suited for one of my portraits.
It's not every day that someone volunteers to model... but I must decline. You're simply not someone I would paint.
A man of medicine who's talent with a scalpel is only surpassed by his skill with a brush... Interesting. What's his outlook? How does he express it on the canvas?
A doctor who has witnessed stories of both recovery and of despair. What does a man like him see in people, Jura? How does he paint?
Are male artists truly so marginalized where you are from, Meia? For us, the mere act of celebrating the works of great women in the field only started recently.
Spawn... camping? I didn't take you for a fan of the outdoors, Futaba.
Another botched hand...
Yes, we did. Joker graciously picked the lock for me.
Peeking under my hoodie were you?
If it's any consolation, I can very easily envision you with fox ears and a tail. It would compliment your hair quite nicely.
Of course! I put this ring together as a child and since then it has never left my side!
Am I truly perceived as so naive? I would consider myself very well educated.
Of course! Countless ideas have already sprung to mind, I cannot wait to sit down with brush in hand...
I was just about to ask why you're playing so poorly. I seriously expected you to have a few tricks of your own.
I'm sorry, Futaba! Your timing is just perfect! As I'm about to remove my boxers and--pffft! Imagine! A man painting with his penis!
Easily the prospect of seeing people change little by little with the passing of each hand.
I've never modeled like this before! Is it not exciting, Futaba? This could be my first great step towards inspiring a brilliant canvas!
You're hardly the first to make such a statement, Tomoko-Chan. Though not many elaborate, may I ask why you find me strange?
I once was quite the fan of the Realist movement. In recent years, however, I've found myself entranced by Abstract Expressionism.
Are you truly not "big on art"? Or do you simply not have the time to fully appreciate it, Deimos? Surely something must appeal to you.
Heavens no! I've hardly even scratched the surface of my unfiltered mind, to alter it in anyway would be foolish!
A variety of things. People, love, friendship, the naked body, trees, shadows, the depths of the heart, hope, particular brands of mochi, trains, despair, sunsets...
I solemnly swear... if I find out this is rigged, you will rue this day!
Is this some kind of ploy to humiliate me?!
This is why I don't play games! The failure state is absolute, with no room for interpretation!
If I may ask, what are the odds behind this losing streak?
Ah, fantastic! My assessment was correct!
...And now I strip! Yes! It is clear to me now!
I would hesitate to call it "his work", unless you're referring to the way in which he desolated the hopes of his pupils.
And you are clearly some sort of poet, am I not mistaken, Amy?
By all means.
I feel as though I am falling.
Like Icarus, I flew too close to the sun...
No! I thought I had escaped the possibility of the forfeit!
I suppose even I must partake in this exercise
It would be selfish of me to win every round...
I care not for winning this game! Strip me to your heart’s desire!
This loss bears no significance... After all we will all be naked by the end of this
And here I thought I had mastered the rules.
It seems as though my spree is at an end...
I suppose it is natural for me to lose a few rounds
My downfall was inevitable.
As if this would faze me.
A frivolous means to an end…
A loss...
So it continues...
Could I have done something differently?
Someone! A glass of water, please!
But I wanted to win...
I suppose it's time for the main event!
Look at me, so far behind...
Dealer? May I please take a break?
Perhaps I should simply stick to art.
I'm not very good at this, am I?
So eager you are for my clothes to fall...
Is it not someone else's turn?
If no one else is willing, I shall fall on the sword.
Subjectively speaking, am I really losing?
Why is everyone staring at me? Did I lose?
How exactly did I lose? I’m not angry, I simply wish to understand.
Your work has you traveling around the world? In that case, I'd love to see what you've done in Moscow! The Russian style has always stirred my imagination.
And yet here you stand. Though scarred and battered, I can tell you've carved a life that is entirely your own. For that you have my respect, Revy.
Is this more of your incomprehensible jargon? I hope you're not just throwing random words together.
As for this ring, it's a childhood art project. I found an old box of keys, and decided to take only the ones that would lead me to a better place.
I'm trying my hardest, but it doesn't seem to be working. Any advice, Futaba? You seem surprisingly good at this.
I assure you it's nothing exciting. Joker and Ryuji have far more interesting undergarments.
"The Oracle fox uses her beguiling wit to charm the pants off of corrupt men before fleeing with their possessions!" It's truly not so different from being a Phantom Thief.
It may seem childish, but hearing them jingle helps relax me when I am high strung.
Please don't finish that sentence...
That's... actually a rather compelling idea, Futaba! But I would need a respectable partner for the activity...Any suggestions?
I presumed as Phantom Thieves we wouldn't be leaving things up to chance, so I have been copying a few cards here and there. Is everyone else not cheating?
By no means. For instance, regarding my socks? Think about how your perception of me changes when my feet are bare.
So I should be considering the state of our table as a whole when choosing what to remove? Only you would have such insight, Oracle.
So whenever you call me "clueless", you're simply referring to the fact that I have yet to reach my full potential? That's surprisingly philosophical, Futaba.
Many artists stumble over the grandeur of their own ideas, oft resulting in a piece that cannot reach the everyman. Simplicity in art is often the result of great discipline.
I've thought about it, but no one has ever asked me. It would be quite presumptions to ask to model for someone, would it not?
Of course. I wouldn't ruin want to ruin my best shoes with the malodor of human sweat.
It is a fairly recent movement I suppose. Still, I think in the future historians will find it a great asset in interpreting our subconscious desires.
Taking note of my character, Bernadetta?
I suppose I shall remove my shoes. Taking off anything else would feel wrong.
Behold! My modeling debut…
Feeling the ground with your feet is an excellent way to take in a room’s atmosphere.
I made this keyring when I was merely a child. Please, take care of it.
I have no issue removing my shirt, but do not expect much.
I’m surprised you still wish to see more of me, but I have no problem obliging.
To think, had Madarame been sincere from the start, the original authors would have been paid for their work. Your brothers would also still have something valuable.
I recall Joker offering to undress for me on several occasions, though he would only do it in inappropriate locations. I suspect that was intentional.
I doubt Makoto or Ann would be interested in something like that anyways. Joker is a very good candidate though! I'll have to ask him the next time I see him.
Very well then. For now I'll simply add it to the list.
I suppose it is folly of me to ask for advice in a game of chance...If I am to "get lucky" though, I would prefer it be through my own merits!
Now that I think on it, I regret not asking Joker for that lock pick. It would have made a wonderful addition.
I humbly request you refrain from running off with my pants.I have a coupon for jagariko I am looking to use.
I had not realized your jacket was just as important. Would you tell me about the day you received it after the game?
I seldom masturbate, I much prefer to put the energy into my art.
Flattery aside, should I remove the rest of my clothes now? No? I'm willing to take full accountability?
Think outside the box Futaba! Envision me holding things with my toes! Or maybe my feet stained purple with grape juice...
I suppose you have never steered us wrong in the past...Very well then! Let us hasten the game!
So be it. I'd rather people understand me more through my art than through my words.
I havn't made a self portrait since before I was a Phantom Thief, Haru! I truly wonder how it would be different...
Futaba has called me a "simp" on several occasions. If she can appreciate the simplicity of my work, than perhaps you can as well, Deimos.
Sounds as if you have the sensibilities of an artist, Bernadetta. I'd be happy to see anything you have created.
Mathematics are precisely the reason I do not sculpt. I don't struggle with them per se, I'd just rather focus on the raw composition of the piece.
Sculpting requires a great deal of planning, which is why I paint. I'd rather make decisions as they come to me.
I always find the sweet melancholy of blue to be quite humbling. It makes me think on own mortality, and what I hope to achieve in this lifetime.
Whenever I see the hues of a fine yellow spread across a canvas, I cannot help but feel energized! It's upbeat energy makes me feel ready to take on anything the world has to offer!
I have found my self taking quite a liking to the stark, rebellious vibrancy of red in recent years. Already, it makes me nostalgic.
Considering the absurdity of this situation, I think a surrealist mentality would benefit us the most, Cynthia.
Please do feel free to share your observations with us, Bernadetta. I trust you have a valuable talent for reading strangers.
I hope my current state is acceptable.
The loss of my shoes truly signifies my commitment to this game.
The floor here feels unusual… it must have a rich history.
Sometimes I sift through the keys, imagining what doors they can open.
You can take the rest of my clothing, but please, allow me to have this back when the game ends.
I would much rather be the man behind the painting than the man in the painting.
I feel as though I am about to step into a warm bath….
I hope I inspire great things from you...
This is as far as I intend to go. From here on I will give my everything to seizing victory!
Honestly now, I cannot feel pity for such men. They are the reason scoundrels such as Madarame are capable of thriving.
What has you so reluctant to partake in the game, N. Is something bothering you?
I cannot help but notice how worn, yet well maintained your Rubik's cube is. It must see frequent use.
You come across as a very sentimental soul, N. I take it your necklace has a story behind it?
What will it be, N? You're free to take your clothing off in any order you know.
How are you faring, N? Have you grown comfortable with the subject of the game?
I already value our friendship, N, and the prospect of you repressing anything concerns me. Which is why I need to tell you something.
There's that reluctant face again. Though I stand by my words, I don't want to force you into anything.
If I may ask again, how are you faring, N? You're almost completely exposed.
Years ago I would never have envisioned myself playing cards with a shady indivdual such as Deimos, but now it is almost nostalgic!
Have you been to a store called Untouchable, Deimos? I sense you would get along with the owner.
It could simply be the coat, but you have a very similar style to my friend Joker. He was our leader.
Is "Deimos" your real name? Or simply a codename to hide your true identiy?
Step forth, ~name~! Show us how it's done!
Can you feel the humility, ~name~?
We can all learn something from ~name~'s loss, though I'm not quite sure what.
Lady Luck must find you attractive, ~name~. You best not disappoint her.
It's very rare for a man like ~name~ to model; I don't plan to waste the opportunity!
Our theme today shall be human desire! Now, ~name~! Give us something to yearn for!
Did you have to lose that one, ~name~? I'm still not done appreciating you as you are now!
I'm not quite sure how to proceed myself. Perhaps ~name~ can set an example for me?
Careful ~name~. Lose anymore and you will end up like me.
I'm not even sure what to expect at this point.
Muster your strength ~name~! It may be too late for me, but you still has a chance of winning!
Now's your chance to leave an impression on me, ~name~!
You're in front of my canvas now, ~name~! Make it count!
~name~ has to strip? How joyous!
You have my attention, ~name~.
A chance for ~name~ to showcase his masculinity!
We all must take a turn, ~name~.
A chance for me to see more of my fellow man.
You can drop out at any time, ~name~.
Do you have the courage to press on?
I expect great things from you, ~name~.
No pressure, ~name~.
I take a turn, ~name~ takes a turn. All is right at The Inventory.
Bare your body with me, ~name~. Together, we shall create something wonderful!
We enter a game of pure chance, and yet we feel bad when we lose. Why do you think that is, ~name~?
Let's cease this charade of modesty! We've all been waiting for ~name~ to lose!
Do not cry for him. It would be both a disservice to ~name~, as well as the spirit of competition!
Despair, shame and...regret. Such glum themes for my work, perhaps a shift in perspective is in order.
You're slipping, ~name~! How will you catch yourself?
Thank you, ~name~.For a moment I was questioning my own chances of winning.
The composition of your outfit has always boggled my mind. I don't even know where to begin.
I must say Futaba, this is far more interesting than the games you have shown me in the past.
You really have come a long way since we first met you. Boss will truly be proud when I tell him about this!
I've always perceived your legs to be quite shapely. Even beyond just your thighs.
Your failure just sparked a brilliant idea within me, Futaba!
I'm hardly used to the sight, yet you're already exposing yourself even further, Futaba?
I always felt you would make for an interesting subject, Futaba. But I never imagined you would actually model for me.
Stripping in front of others can be daunting for many. Are you sure you're up to the task, Futaba?
Have you ever considered making your own video game, Futaba? Your passion for them is quite impressive, and you certainly don't lack imagination.
Seeing as your involved in the arts tonight...What's your favorite era of art history, Futaba? Renaissance? Baroque? Rococo?
Go without fear, Futaba! I doubt anyone would be ogling you for your breasts.
Strange, On the surface you look just like Lady Ann...
I can't say I was expecting to see you here, Haru. But when I think on it, it isn't that surprising.
Ah, I've been meaning to tell you! I sold a painting today, and it was inspired by the sapling you gifted me!
You didn't happen to bring anything from Big Bang Burger with you, did you Haru?
With how well thought out your outfits are, Haru, it's truly fascinating seeing one broken down piece by piece.
Courage, Haru! Simply imagine how you would handle a business meeting... If everyone had to attend naked.
Still thinking about that meeting, Haru? I'm quite curious to see what kind of woman would attend.
"Mother Haru," was it? It's funny. I wouldn't have suspected it, but it makes sense in retrospect.
Your eyes are like daggers, Mother Haru... I'm not in trouble, am I?
Your form is quite compact. Are you some sort of athlete?
I'm excited to set upon this new exercise regimen I await your knowledge, Emi!
The mere concept of exercise is so vast... I must confess I have no idea where to start...
I can feel the dormant power within my muscle, awaiting to be unleashed! Emi! What is the first step?!
When I imagine my new life of fitness, it manifests as pure fantasy. Is this truly something I want?
I cannot help but think of all the barriers that would prevent me from attaining peak fitness. Surly there must be a way...
It's becoming clear to me that it is it's own craft to become even above average in fitness! Perhaps I should cut Ryuji some slack...
Emi, your guidance has revealed to me that you are a woman of great drive and ambition! What gave you such determination?
Your attitude towards hardship and doubt reminds me of an old friend of mine. What made you so strong Emi?
Your confidence towards physicality is truly a sight to behold! How did you build yourself up to where you are now?
Emi, I wish to paint you so that your story may inspire others! May I see your prosthetic legs?
I can't keep such an inspiring tale to myself! But need to understand the nature of your injury if I am to capture it within my canvas. May I see your legs?
Would you show me your prosthetics Emi? I wish to understand your modus operandi before I share it through my art!
Acrylic resin...Carbon fiber... Titanium?! I can only imagine what they will look like in motion!
Apparently the first recorded prosthetic belonged to a warrior queen...Huh, Emi as a warrior queen...
Belts and straps keeps the limb attached... So beneath those socks is an entire suspension system!
You're like an angel who has had her wings taken away Emi. Too striking and pure for our world, and yet you press on. The stripes on your socks naturally signify that.
This is a bittersweet moment, after all -I'm sorry, I should remain silent.
What exactly are you champion of, Cynthia? I can't say I have ever heard of you before.
We don't have any creatures known as Pokémon in my region, but hearing the word stirs up strange memories...
What's your most powerful Pokémon, Cynthia? I imagine to garner so many victories, you must have some some kind of ace.
I must say, I'm quite excited to see the champion of an entire region nude!
You get more and more serious with the loss of each article. Is this not a game of leisure for you, Cynthia?
You're sharp, beautiful, and talented, Cynthia. I can easily see how you inspire others as champion... Where do you wish to grow from here?
I've been eyeing you since you first got here, Komi-san. I feel as though I could stare into your face for hours...
(Judging by Komi-san's face, I'd wager she's feeling conflicted in some way... Perhaps she...No! She is clearly hungry! She wants ice cream!)
(Strange. It almost feels like I am gazing at an alternate version of Futaba, one who's heart we never stole.)
Tomoko-chan! When this game is through, would you be interested in spending some time together?
The entire cityscape is ours to explore, Tomoko-chan! Where do you wish to go first?
I've got it, Tomoko-Chan! What if we ventured to the grocery store together?
Heavens, I nearly forgot! Shall we exchange phone numbers, Tomoko-chan? This entire plan would be folly if we had no means of communication.
Now we can observe ~name~ strip with all the subtlety of a sledgehammer.
I'd much rather see ~name~ win. Her excessive flirtation hides other characteristics that I would love to see.
You have a chance to redeem yourself from your depravity here, ~name~. Don't waste it.
Somewhere in Mementos, there is a shadow of ~name~, her horrid desires unfit for anyone to witness.
What does a woman of your beauty even get from debasing herself like this?
~Name~, if you had an iota of modesty, I wouldn't be judging you in such a way.
I don't mean to discredit your perspective, ~name~. I just cannot condone such aggressive perversity.
The rules dictate that ~name~ must strip now.
Here we stand, awaiting ~name~ to show us her beauty!
I expect great things from you, ~name~!
You knew the rules, ~name~.
That expression... what is going through your head, I wonder?
Only ~name~ can choose if she wishes to continue.
A stunning opportunity to see more of ~name~'s body!
Always a privilege to see more of ~name~.
Now that I think on it, this is a much more socially acceptable way of asking you to model for me.
Give us something to remember, ~name~!
Like the coming of spring, my expectations for ~name~ fill me with excitement!
Go on, ~name~.
Nothing short of fate has put ~name~ in front of me right now...
~name~...
I'm sorry ~name~. My current state must only be making the situation more awkward.
The timing of this... Strip poker truly has no mercy.
I can't envision anyone else but ~name~ stripping right now!
~Name~'s turn? My! It seems I've lucked out with more than just my cards!
Even in defeat, you are beautiful, ~name~.
~Name~ lost through sheer chance. In a sense, that makes what comes next all the more valuable.
The proverbial bottle has spun, and landed on you, ~name~. How will you proceed?
I could list all the reasons I am excited to see ~name~ strip, but that might be redundant in the grand scheme of things.
Getting distracted, are we, ~name~?
And to think, it only cost me the clothes on my back!
Defeat doesn't have to be ugly. ~Name~ proves that!
What's ~name~ going to remove? How is she going to remove it?! The anticipation is killing me!
